description:
Cat`s Hand
Mom is pulling an all-nighter. She puts in all her effort and faces the table but there are two cats on it: Kiku and Tora are lying on it. She keeps on getting disturbed by them and when she tries to get rid of them...
A Child`s Heart: Parent Doesn`t Know
Mom and Bunji play hard in an arcade. Mom is feeling high-strung the whole time, crunching on snacks, eating right outside an outdoor store, and so on, and she drags Bunji along.
Shiritori
Bunji and Fumi started a game of shiritori. The entire conversation has become shiritori. And after some time, Dad, Mom, and Grandma got involved too...
Grandfather`s Glasses
From an unexpected source, Fumi starts thinking about what death is. She wonders if people become stars when they die. When Mom sees her, she brings out her memento of her late grandfather, his glasses, and starts talking to her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cat`s Hand / A Child`s Heart Parent Doesn`t Know / Shiritori / Grandfather`s Glasses
ネコの手 / 子の心, 親知らず / しりとり / おじいちゃんのめがね
